name: Create New
description: Create a new resource, endpoint, or component from scratch

requirements.name: Resource Name
requirements.description: The name of the resource/entity to create
requirements.question: What is the resource name? (e.g., Order, Product, Event)

requirements.name: HTTP Method
requirements.description: The HTTP method for the endpoint
requirements.question: What HTTP method?

requirements.name: Endpoint Path
requirements.description: The URL path for the endpoint
requirements.question: What is the endpoint path? (e.g., /api/v1/orders)

requirements.name: Request Fields
requirements.question: What fields should the request contain? (e.g., customerId, items[], shippingAddress)

requirements.name: Response Fields
requirements.question: What fields should be returned in the response?

requirements.name: Downstream Services
requirements.question: Does this need to call any downstream services? (e.g., payment service, notification service)

requirements.name: Persist Data
requirements.description: Whether to save data to database
requirements.question: Should this data be persisted to the database?
